remarks: A weak universe is closed under unordered triple.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
wununi.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) $.
wununi.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
wunpr.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. U ) $.
wuntp.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. U ) $.
wuntp $p |- ( ph -> { A , B , C } e. U ) $.
